name: Voiden;Scape
description:
Voiden;Scape is a passion project of mine that I'm doing in my free time. Rather than the traditional system of multiple choice or having AI synthesize commands you type, reader-submitted actions are ran through google forms, and whichever one I like the most gets chosen. Less of a game; more of a webnovel.

If you don't like reading yet are very conditioned to playing videogames, who knows? You might enjoy Voiden;Scape. Also, I can't promise incredible quality or anything like that; I know nothing about code and am creating this game in Twine just for the hell of it. Have a suggestion? Utilize the comments! 

Thanks for playing.
